script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Get ready for some pure musical energy! Our next act is Andrea, a Google Data Engineer from London, originally from Italy. Andrea, we hear you're putting a unique spin on a classic, and there's a special dedication in the house tonight?

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Okay, Andrea! 'Somebody to Love' with a data twist - I dig it! You got guts, man!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Love the Queen vibe, Andrea! Freddie would've approved of the energy, for sure. And 'find some data to flow' - genius!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: The dedication to Sara was pretty smooth, Andrea.  But honestly, the emotion in your voice is what really got me.  Beautiful.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Well, Andrea, you're very sweet.  I always appreciate a bit of data flow in my life.  You've got a great voice!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Andrea, you've got the judges feeling the love, and maybe even a little bit of data overload! What say you, judges - yes or no?

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: I'm a sucker for a good Queen cover, and you put your own spin on it. It's a yes from me.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: You've got passion, dude!  And you made data engineers look cool.  That's a yes!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: That was heartfelt, Andrea.  I felt it. It's a yes.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you've got a really charming stage presence.  It's a yes from me!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses, Andrea!  Looks like love, music, and data flow go hand in hand!  Congratulations!
